import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Certificates = ({ user }) => { return (

Certificates

View and download your completion certificates

Certificate Management

This module will allow you to view, download, and manage your course completion certificates and achievements.

Features coming soon:

  • View earned certificates
  • Download PDF certificates
  • Certificate validation
  • Share certificates
  • Certificate expiration tracking
 ); }; export default Certificates;
